meanings.sent1: The artist used magentas to paint a beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent2: The flowers in the garden bloomed in various shades of magentas.
meanings.sent3: The magentas in the painting seemed to dance together in harmony.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks turned magentas with embarrassment.
meanings.sent5: The magentas of the sky during twilight were breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: She bought a set of markers in different magentas.
meanings.sent2: The fabric store had a sale on various magentas.
meanings.sent3: The magentas on the wall added a pop of color to the room.
meanings.sent4: The magentas of the flowers in the garden blended beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The magentas of the sunset painted the sky in hues of beauty.
